title: CW's, Random Questions, Comedy Roulette, Linda VS Tommy, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Fool #1, Dr. Habib, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: CW's, Random Questions, Comedy Roulette, Linda VS Tommy, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Fool #1, Dr. Habib, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The show is dedicated to cubicle workers. Steve answers random questions and one may involve $1 billion dollars (Dr. Evil voice). Comedy Roulette lets you know when you went too far. Linda plays the game Are You Smarter Than Tommy. Dr. Habib does the Fitness and Wellness Segment. Plus, Big Dog talks about guilt, what you don't have to do and much more in Closing Remarks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
